author: donschoe
content: Would there be any interest at the Eth2 client teams to have a call on release management and different strategies to ship stabilized code? I could prepare something and we can rule out common issues and assist working towards more stable mainnet releases.

author: jgm
content: `ethereal` v2.3.23 has support for zinken, and https://thegraph.com/explorer/subgraph/attestantio/eth2deposits-zinken is live

author: djrtwo
content: <@557201004060213248> good idea! Happy to help where possible
